description: A machine learning-based video super resolution and frame interpolation framework. Est. Hack the Valley II, 2018.

A hybrid quantum-classical machine learning framework implementing quantum circuits with PennyLane for binary classification tasks. This repository demonstrates quantum computing integration with both TensorFlow and PyTorch backends.
Predicting the ZT values of thermoelectric materials through an advanced machine learning framework

QuoreMindHP v1.0.0 es un framework robusto y sofisticado que combina machine learning clsico con anlisis estadstico de ultra-alta precisin. Su arquitectura modular permite extensiones fciles y mantenimiento sostenible. Ideal para aplicaciones que requieren precisin numrica excepcional combinada con poder predictivo del aprendizaje automtico

Methodological framework for low-cost sensor calibration and air quality monitoring. Public repository developed as part of a PhD research on signal processing and machine learning for environmental metrology.

ASEADOSSDNIoT, a novel and publicly available intrusion detection dataset supported by a fully documented hybrid testbed framework. The resulting dataset contains 457,044 labeled flow instances with 83 statistical features and was evaluated using state-of-the-art machine learning (ML) and deep learning (DL) techniques.
A framework for wrapping Machine Learning projects with rest API

Machine learning framework to analyze correlations in PrizePicks betting. Includes data pipeline for player stats, regression and ML models for correlation, and visualizations to support strategy simulations using public sports databases.

modular template for building Zero-Knowledge Machine Learning systems  ZKML Blueprint is an open-source framework designed to help developers, researchers, and builders create verifiable machine learning systems using zero-knowledge proofs. It provides a structured reference architecture, example circuits, model workflows, and tools for integrating

SMILE is a featurebased machine learning classification framework for eventinterval sequence data. While its primary application is medical diagnostics using Electronic Health Record data, the framework is generalisable to domains such as human activity recognition, music classification, and manufacturing telemetry.
A Machine-Learning Framework for Epileptic Seizure Identification using Bangalore EEG Data
An autoML framework & toolkit for machine learning on graphs.

Comparative analysis of machine learning classifiers on the UCI Bank Marketing dataset using the CRISP-DM framework. Models include Logistic Regression, KNN, Decision Tree, and SVM, with tuning and class imbalance handling for improved F1 and ROC-AUC.
A communication framework between client applications and machine learning models

Accent Converter is an AIpowered Django web application that processes audio files, performs accent conversion using machine learning models, and generates bilingual subtitles. It combines speech processing, transliteration, and a scalable backend with a simple, interactive frontend for accessibility.
High frequency trading (HFT) framework built for futures using machine learning and deep learning techniques.

FlaMMA (Flaky Mitigation & Monitoring Approach) is a framework for detecting, mitigating, and monitoring flaky tests in real projects. It combines rerun analysis, machine learning, and automated repair strategies to improve test reliability, reduce CI instability, and support more trustworthy software testing.

A web application that predicts disease likelihood from patient input using a machine learning model and exposes the model via a Django web app (REST API + web UI).   Built with Python, scikit-learn, pandas (model), and Django + Django REST Framework (backend & API). Ideal as a small end-to-end demo for healthcare/ML portfolios.

Pax is a Jax-based machine learning framework for training large scale models. Pax allows for advanced and fully configurable experimentation and parallelization, and has demonstrated industry leading model flop utilization rates.

A Python-based framework for detecting anomalies in textual data using NLP, machine learning, and deep learning. Implements unsupervised and supervised models, transformer-based embeddings (BERT, RoBERTa), and geospatial analysis to enable automated content verification, trend monitoring, and location-based anomaly detection.
This repository seeks to leverage machine learning frameworks to tackle Valley Fever disease. Goal is to identify compounds that inhibit the disease.

This repo features the code, input and output files for my undergraduate thesis titled "Design and optimization of an integrated computational and machine learning framework to detect functional variants and elucidate their contributions to biological pathways".
An MLOps framework to package, deploy, monitor and manage thousands of production machine learning models

QuantFolio is a C#-based multi-asset portfolio management framework that integrates data collection, cleaning, optimization, backtesting, and visualization. It supports machine learning models, risk analysis, and customizable strategies, with a modern GUI for building, testing, and comparing investment portfolios.
Tech Soft 3D tutorials of python CAD framework for machine learning development. Requires HOOPS AI

A real-time Digital Twin framework for Predictive Maintenance (PdM) of rotating machinery. Uses MQTT for live sensor data streaming, Streamlit for dashboard visualization, and Machine Learning models (Random Forest/LSTM) to predict Remaining Useful Life (RUL) and detect anomalies.
This repository includes all the code developed during my in-depth exploration of machine learning and deep learning frameworks.

A federated learning platform for training diffusion models on distributed sensitive healthcare data to produce high-fidelity synthetic datasets without raw data leaving source nodes. Built with Flower (FL framework), PyTorch, and Opacus (DP).
A Julia machine learning framework

gold-random-forest-trading-system ist ein modulares Quant-Framework fr algorithmisches Gold-Trading. Es verbindet Machine Learning, technische Analyse, Sentiment, Backtesting und Live-Trading ber die Oanda API. Ziel ist die Untersuchung, ob sich der Goldpreis unter realistischen Marktbedingungen zuverlssig prognostizieren lsst.
An open-source machine learning framework for global analyses of parton distributions.

Comprehensive quantitative analysis of global anti-money laundering risks across 203 countries using advanced statistical methods and machine learning. Provides evidence-based policy frameworks for international AML/CFT cooperation, regional coordination strategies, and strategic intervention targeting.
This project presents a hybrid anomaly detection framework combining Machine Learning and Deep Learning models to identify cloud-based cyber threats.
an open-sourced highly automated machine learning Python framework for data-driven geochemistry discovery
Anvil is a Rust-based machine learning framework designed to combine the performance of low-level linear algebra with the ease of high-level ML APIs.
Credit scoring model using Python and machine learning (CRISP-ML(Q) framework).
A multi-party collaborative machine learning framework
Comprehensive Tunneling Performance Analytics - ML framework for MTBM optimization with 90%+ accuracy, 50+ SQL queries, Power BI dashboards |          Python, scikit-learn, SQL"
Integrative Multi-Omics and Machine Learning Framework for Alzheimers Disease Risk Gene Identification and Early Diagnosis
An inference server for your machine learning models, including support for multiple frameworks, multi-model serving and more

The Multi-Agent RLRM (Reinforcement Learning with Reward Machines) Framework is a library designed to facilitate the formulation of multi-agent problems and solve them through reinforcement learning. The framework supports the integration of Reward Machines (RMs), providing a modular and flexible structure for defining complex tasks.
A neural network architecture for Machine Learning driven Data Quality Monitoring (DQM) framework in collider Experiments

The Context-Aware LSTM Framework for Intelligent News Categorization and Real-Time Dispatch is an end-to-end machine learning project for classifying news articles into four categories (World, Sports, Business, Sci/Tech). It utilizes a trained LSTM model (or a Logistic Regression/SVM model combined with TF-IDF, based on the joblib pipeline)

This project presents a complete machine-learning framework for predicting and optimizing CO capture efficiency in an MEA-based absorption system, one of the most widely used post-combustion carbon capture technologies.

A machine learning framework using Logistic Regression, Random Forest, and XGBoost to detect credit card fraud in real time. Built on the Kaggle dataset, it delivers scalable, explainable, and business-ready risk scoring for banks and financial institutions.

Multi_Predicto is a modular machine-learning system designed to predict various real-world outcomes - from laptop and smartphone prices to commodity and cryptocurrency trends. Built for experimentation, it allows training and comparing multiple regression and ensemble models in one flexible framework.
Algorithmic Trading in Python with Machine Learning
An evaluation framework for machine learning models simulating high-throughput materials discovery.

This repository explores Machine Learning through projects, scripts, and tutorials. It covers data preprocessing, model training, evaluation, and deployment using frameworks like scikit-learn, TensorFlow, and PyTorch, with applications in classification, regression, NLP, and computer vision.

Machine learning framework for urban flood probability prediction using meteorological, topographic, and hydrologic features. Achieves R = 0.861 with Neural Networks. CSE 572 Final Project, Arizona State University.

An explainable machine learning framework for predicting compressive and flexural strengths of CNT-reinforced composites using Random Forest and XGBoost. Includes preprocessing scripts, model training, parity plots, ICE-based interpretability, and evaluation metrics.

A fully autonomous AI-driven financial intelligence framework for real-time transaction analysis, anomaly detection, predictive analytics, and cognitive insights. Built with Next.js, machine learning, secure pipelines, and automated workflows for modern intelligent finance systems.

A collection of machine learning projects and experiments covering end-to-end ML pipelines, from model development to deployment. Focused on practical AI engineering, ML frameworks and MLOps practices.

This project implements a comprehensive machine learning framework for managing a $1 billion portfolio in the oil and gas equity sector. The system combines traditional quantitative finance with advanced deep learning techniques to optimize returns while maintaining rigorous risk controls.

Developed a hybrid machine learning framework combining PCA and Stacked Autoencoders to identify malicious data  injection attacks in smart grids. Built a real-time web monitoring dashboard using Django and MySQL, enabling data visualization of attack patterns. Improved detection accuracy and  ensuring secure and efficient smart grid operations
A modular financial signal extraction and forecasting framework built with Python and machine learning.

This project focuses on detecting and analyzing malicious mobile applications that steal data, invade privacy, or exploit device resources. Using static, dynamic, and hybrid analysis with machine learning, it identifies suspicious behaviors and permissions, providing an adaptive framework for secure and trusted mobile use.
A unified framework for privacy-preserving data analysis and machine learning

A comprehensive Python framework for automated data analysis, machine learning, and AI-powered insights. Features AutoML, explainable AI (SHAP/LIME), time series forecasting, interactive dashboards, and automated report generation.
Open-source machine learning framework developed by Google for building and training neural networks and other AI models.
Repositrio com diferos estudos sobre machine learning, conceitos de Python como POO, frameworks como Django e mais

This project is a comprehensive cybersecurity solution that focuses on detecting phishing websites and analyzing DDoS attacks through simulation. It combines Machine Learning, Real-Time Web Application Monitoring, and Load Balancerbased attack simulation to create an end-to-end security framework.
DeepMech: A Machine Learning Framework for Chemical Reaction Mechanism Prediction

A collection of deep learning models, training pipelines, experiments, and utilities built using modern machine learning frameworks. This repository includes clean, modular implementations of popular neural network architectures, along with reproducible training scripts, experiment tracking, and tools for data processing.

A foundational MLOps framework designed to operationalize the machine learning lifecycle using MLflow. This project establishes a standardized pipeline for experiment tracking, model versioning, and reproducible deployment.

Stroke Prediction with Explainable AI: A robust machine learning framework for predicting stroke risk using classical models, focusing on handling class imbalance and providing clinical interpretability with SHAP.

HybridLinkSim is a simulation framework for modeling, analyzing, and comparing Radio Frequency (RF) and optical communication links in space missions. It integrates atmospheric attenuation models, link budget analysis, and machine learningbased performance prediction across multiple orbital scenarios (LEO, GEO, and Lunar).

Hybrid Expert System + Machine Learning framework for Predictive Maintenance of Aircraft Engines. Includes RUL% prediction, expert rule-based alerts, engine condition classification (OK/WARNING/DANGER), hybrid decision logic, full notebook, dataset pipeline, and visualization.
A machine learning framework analyzing 80k+ support interactions to predict customer satisfaction (CSAT) and optimize agent allocation.

Tywra ML is a front-end machine learning website built using the React.js library and the Next.js framework. This website was created as a simple project while also continuing advanced learning of JavaScript.
A comprehensive testing suite for validating ROCm (Radeon Open Compute) functionality with Python machine learning frameworks and libraries.
Machine Learning framework for Air Quality Index prediction using BiLSTM, ConvLSTM, XGBoost with interactive Dash web app

Machine Learning framework for PWR abnormality detection using an optimized Random Forest model with SMOTE balancing and Grid Search tuning. Includes full evaluation, ROC-AUC, confusion matrix, feature importance, and reproducible code from the research publication.
lamp++ fast and lightweight machine learning framework in cpp, supporting tensors and autograd. includes implementations of basic neural networks

A framework integrating sentiment analysis with machine learning enhances cyberbullying detection on social media. Optimized preprocessing and balanced penta-class data improve accuracy. Extra Trees achieved 95.38% accuracy and 0.95 F1, showing sentiment features boost classification performance.
A Python modular framework for backtesting equity trading strategies with full performance analytics and "plug and play" strategies, including machine learning strategies.
This repository contains the supplementary materials for the paper: Machine Learning Framework for Speech Intelligibility Prediction using Binaural Room Impulse Responses (Alfian et al., 2025)

MetaMorph is an open-source framework that leverages the power of Large Language Models (LLMs) to process, extract, and transform messy, unstructured, or heterogeneous columns of metadata into structured, machine-readable formats to enhance machine learning pipelines and predictive models across any domain.
SecureFedChain: A Blockchain-Enabled Federated Learning Framework with Homomorphic Encryption for Privacy-Preserving Distributed Machine Learning

Machine learning framework predicting U.S. county-level opioid cost per capita (20132023) by integrating Pharmacy Benefit Management (PBM) levers and Social Determinants of Health (SDOH). Includes data pipelines, simulation code, and reproducible figures.

This repository contains an ongoing project focused on detecting payment delays and banking fraud using Artificial Intelligence. The goal is to build a robust, end-to-end machine learning pipeline capable of identifying anomalous patterns in loan repayments, transaction behaviors, and potential fraudulent activities within financial systems.

A modular machine learning framework for building, training, and evaluating regression models on multivariate time-series data. Includes preprocessing utilities, sliding-window generation, custom model pipelines, feature selection, and performance visualization.

Developed within the framework of the Machine Learning curriculum at Ben-Gurion University, this project translates theoretical algorithmic concepts into a practical, end-to-end data processing pipeline.
The PennyLane-Qrack plugin integrates the Qrack quantum computing framework with PennyLane's quantum machine learning capabilities.
A differentiable ray tracer using the PyTorch machine-learning framework in Python.

Sentyr is an ultra-fast AI agent framework that delivers automated cybersecurity triage, analysis, and incident response through machine learning, behavioral analysis, real-time event processing (under 100ms latency), and seamless integrations with platforms like CrowdStrike, Jira, and VirusTotal.
Hybrid Machine Learning and Partial Differential Equation Framework for Modern Option Pricing

A hybrid modelling framework for carbon emission forecasting integrating system identification (AR/ARX models), deterministic trend decomposition, and machine-learning residual learning. Includes data preprocessing, regional CO analysis, rolling out-of-sample forecasting, and cross-continental model comparison.

A comprehensive educational repository featuring "from-scratch" implementations of fundamental machine learning, deep learning, and reinforcement learning algorithms in Python, designed to illustrate the mathematical core of models without reliance on high-level frameworks.
A machine learning project built with Swift and Apples Natural Language framework to perform real-time sentiment analysis on user input.

The aim of this research is to develop and evaluate a machine-learning framework that integrates electroencephalography (EEG) and electromyography (EMG) signals to improve the recognition and prediction of upper-limb gestures
Explainable Machine Learning Framework for Credit Risk Assessment

Today, I explored how to build interactive AI applications using the Gradio framework  a powerful tool that allows you to create simple, shareable web interfaces for your machine learning and Generative AI models.

We present a comprehensive physics-informed machine learning frameworkPhysics-Guided Equation Discovery (PGED)that discovers a full, interpretable dynamical equation for the geomagnetic Dst index using only its historical time series. Trained on 139,872 hourly measurements, PGED recovers an 11-term sparse ordinary differential equation that.

An open-source Python framework that integrates machine learning interatomic  potentials (MLIPs) with a tailored batched optimization strategy, enabling rapid,  unbiased structure prediction across the full density range

An acausal modeling framework for automatically parallelized scientific machine learning (SciML) in Julia. A computer algebra system for integrated symbolics for physics-informed machine learning and automated transformations of differential equations
A framework to serve various generative AIs and other machine learning functions via WebSocket and JSONRPC.
